evaluation.visualFeatures: Erythematous lesions, papulovesicular lesions, location - chest and back, scratching marks
evaluation.treatment: Mild topical steroid - Betnovat - 2 times a day - up to 2 weeks, fragrance-free hypoallergenic moisturizer several times a day, hypoallergenic products
evaluation.alternativePlan: If no improvement within 1 to 2 weeks - topical calcineurin inhibitor
evaluation.followUp: Follow-up - 2 to 4 weeks, if no improvement - referral - dermatologists
